import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete inventory items"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/bulk/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Performs a bulk delete operation on inventory catalog items. Can delete by specific IDs or by query filter when `IsSelectAll` is true.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Returns a job ID for tracking the background operation.

**Use Case**: Useful for large-scale cleanup operations or archiving obsolete catalog items.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Bulk delete request with item IDs or query filter.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for bulk deleting inventory catalog items.","properties":{"InventoryItemIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"List of inventory item IDs to delete."},"Request":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Single item in a bulk delete request.","properties":{"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the inventory item to delete."}},"title":"BulkDeleteInventoryItemRequest"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Additional request parameters."},"IsSelectAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, delete all items matching the filter instead of specific IDs."},"InventoryItemRequest":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for querying inventory catalog items. Extends standard paging and filtering options.","properties":{"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Paging and sorting controls accepted by inventory queries.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based index of the page to retrieve."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Maximum number of records to return per page."},"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Inventory field to sort on, such as `Name` or `LocationId`."},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Direction to sort results."}},"title":"InventoryPagingOptions"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Generic filter used across inventory search operations.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the facet to filter on, such as `keyword`, `InventoryItemId`, or `LocationId`."},"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of UUIDs to match when filtering facets that accept identifiers.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of raw values used when filtering keyword or text facets.","items":{"type":"string"}},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Single-value fallback used by certain legacy facets."}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"InventoryRequestFilter"},{"type":"object","properties":{"Facet":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Facet keys returned by the filter service for entity type `75a1a773-e4ac-46ab-9f53-d3f6c4aa073b`, which powers parts and consumables catalog searches in Incident IQ. Call `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}` to retrieve additional keys when new filters are introduced.","enum":["customfieldaddress","customfieldassets","customfieldchangerequests","customfieldconfirmationmessage","customfielddate","customfielddaterange","customfielddatetime","customfielddetailssection","customfieldemailmessage","customfieldinformation","customfieldipaddress","customfieldlocations","customfieldmultilinetext","customfieldmultiselect","customfieldnumber","customfieldnumberrange","customfieldphone","customfieldprotectedinfo","customfieldrichtext","customfieldscheduleselector","customfieldselect","customfieldtext","customfieldusers","customfieldyesno","inventoryitem","inventoryitemcategory","inventoryitemname","inventoryitemnumber","keyword","location","qty"],"example":"inventoryitem","title":"PartSearchFacetKey"}],"description":"Facet key accepted by the parts catalog (for example, `inventoryitem`, `inventoryitemcategory`, or `qty`)."}}}],"title":"InventoryItemRequestFilter"},"description":"Array of filters to apply to the query."},"Fields":{"type":"array","description":"Optional projection list for field selection.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"GetInventoryItemsRequest"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"Filter to identify items when IsSelectAll is true."}},"title":"BulkInventoryItemsDeleteRequest"},"example":{"InventoryItemIds":["2b0e2cb0-4cb5-4b0f-9a7d-2c9f2ac830d2","3c1f3dc1-5dc6-5c10-0b8e-3d003bd941e3"],"IsSelectAll":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
